EmailTemplate.subject: Display Failures and Exchange Costs Got You Down?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Frustrated by failures and exchange costs? Stop supporting your aircraft with DU-870 spares that have a limited life span and are not supported under the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP). Instead, improve your vision and add instant value to your aircraft by upgrading to Honeywell DU-875 LCD displays with Pentastar Aviation, an authorized Honeywell Avionics Dealer. Replace one or all of your old CRT DU-870 displays and receive the many benefits that come with this easy upgrade, including:
- Reduced cost of ownership with lighter LCD displays that provide a weight reduction of up to 7lbs per unit, that translates to significant fuel savings
- Increased display reliability
- 12-month warranty
- Growth plan that takes advantage of future technologies and applications
Plus, when you upgrade one or all of your displays you can take advantage of a limited-time $35,000 trade-in credit per DU-870 display unit (no limit), plus additional Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) incentives. This trade in offer is only good through 6/30/19 so don’t delay. Avoid obsolescence and save up to $210,000* by taking advantage of this limited-time screen upgrade promotion.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/DU-875_Upgrade_Pentastar.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_pentastar_du875]]>
*Savings are based on the upgrade of up to six (6) DU-875 LCD screens on Global Express aircraft. Ask us about the savings for your aircraft model.
